thread.title: Ground News - Local leader steps up to help meet the needs of unhoused neighbors in Howard County
thread.title_full: Ground News - Local leader steps up to help meet the needs of unhoused neighbors in Howard County

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Local leader steps up to help meet the needs of unhoused neighbors in Howard County
text:
Summary by Ground News WRTV's Lauren Casey surprises Dennine Smith with the Jefferson Award for Multiplying Good. C.A.M. serves the needs of under-served populations in Howard County and surrounding communities. The organization provides shelter, food, hygiene items, assistance with housing applications, transportation and more. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
WRTV Center High Factuality Corporation: E. W. Scripps Company Local leader steps up to help meet the needs of unhoused neighbors in Howard County KOKOMO Each month, WRTV awards someone in the central Indiana the Jefferson Award for Multiplying Good. It is awarded to a person who is making a difference in their community, helping make central Indiana a great place to live. This month's award winner was not expecting to receive this honor as we joined her to kick of Hunger and Homelessness Awareness Week in Howard County.Dennine Smith was surrounded by volunteers, family and community memb…
